summary: Craftable Imperial Armor and Weapons with this mod is now available when smithing.
descriptionHtml:
You can craft Imperial Sword, Imperial Bows, Imperial Light Armor, or Imperial Studded (Imperial Chainmail) Armor.

I did change the name of firewood to timber.  Timber is needed to make the imperial bow.  I wanted a reason to go chop wood.  This mod adds a good reason to do so.

The second file is Penitus and General Tulius.  I did alter General Tulius Armor to being light. 

Also, you can temper Imperial Studded armor with this mod.  

Installation Instructions
_______________________


Step 1......... Download
Step 2......... Unpack rar
Step 3......... Put file into Skryrim/Data folder
Step 4......... Start your Skyrim Launcher
Step 5......... Make sure that the mod is checked
Step 6......... Start game
author: ManiusPrime

files.name: Craftable Penitus Armor and General Tulius
